title: Elon Musk's AI company, xAI, acquires a generative AI video startup
body: Elon Musk's AI company, xAI, has acquired Hotshot, a startup working on AI-powered video generation tools along the lines of OpenAI's Sora. Aakash Sastry, Hotshot's CEO and co-founder, announced the news in a post on X on Monday.
